Bose Ogulu bụ onye Naijiria gụrụ akwụkwọ, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye njikwa
Ọ na-ejikwa ọrụ egwu nwa ya nwoke bụ Burna Boy wee bụrụkwa nkea ana-akpọ Mama Burna
onye nkatọ egwu Naijiria bụ Benson Idonije, bụ onye njikwa Fela Kuti

Site na nzere bachelọ nka n'asụsụ mba ofesi yana Masters of Arts na ntụgharị sitere na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Ogulu nwere ọrụ gara nkeọma  dị ka onye ntụgharị maka Federation of West African Chambers of Commerce
Ọ na-asụ Bekee nke ọma, French, German, Italian na Yoruba
Ọ chiko bara ụlọ akwụkwọ asụsụ a na-akpọ Bridges Language, ebe ọ haziri njem imikpu omenala maka ihe karịrị otu puku mmadụ na narị asatọ na-eto eto
Na mgbakwunye, ọ kuziri French afọ iri na Mahadum Education na Port Harcourt, na-ala ezumike nka na 2018
Ogulu na-elekọta ọrụ egwu nwa ya nwoke Damini, onye na-eme dị ka Burna Boy na nwa nwanyị Nissi, onye na-eme n'aha nke ya
Ọ jikwara Burna Boy ruo 2014 wee bụrụ onye njikwa ya ọzọ site na 2017 gaa n'ihu, nweta aha Mama Burna
Ọ chịkọtala ihe nrite maka Burna Boy na mmemme dị iche iche, gụnyere All Africa Music Awards, The Headies na MTV Europe Music Award
Mgbe ọ nụrụ na Burna Boy emeriela ihe nrite MTV nke 2019 maka Best African Act, ọ kwụsịrị ihe ngosi ya iji gwa ya
Mgbe Burna Boy meriri ihe nrite anọ na 2018 Soundcity MVP Awards Festival, Ogulu nọchitere anya ya ma mee ka mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nwee mmetụta site n'ikwu "Na-atụ anya ara karịa"

Na 2019 BET Awards na California, Ogulu guzoro ka nwa ya nwoke nweta ihe nrite maka Best International Act wee kwuo okwu na-echetara ndị Africa-America ka ha cheta "unu bụ ndị Africa tupu ị ghọọ ihe ọ bụla ọzọ" nke butere ikwu oto
Bose Ogulu bụ onye nchoputa na Onye ịsị nke Spaceship Collective , ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide Spaceship Records (akara ngosi ntụrụndụ) na Spaceship Publishing (akwa mbipụta)
